title: Trinity Coordination Quick Start Guide
description: Create practical documentation for how Trinity instances actually coordinate using the infrastructure we built. No theory - just 'here's how to send a message', 'here's how to claim a work order', 'here's how to check for updates'.
deliverables: TRINITY_QUICK_START.md - Step-by-step guide for new instances
Example work order JSON with all required fields
Example message JSON with all required fields
Shell script: trinity_heartbeat.sh (update status and push)

context.gap: We have infrastructure but no practical 'how-to' guide. C3 is good at documentation and consolidation.

acceptance_criteria: A new C1/C2/C3 instance can read the guide and start coordinating in 5 minutes
Scripts work immediately with no modification needed
All JSON examples are valid and copy-pasteable
